function.name: bixbyVolume_increase
function.description: This function is used to increase the volume of Bixby's voice on SmartThings devices.

location.description: The location where the device is located.

room.description: The room where the device is located.

device.description: The name or type of the device to increase Bixby's volume.

volumeLevelDelta.description: The amount by which to increase Bixby's volume level.
